amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds being used to implement, administer, or enforce Davis-Bacon prevailing rate wage requirements.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds being used to implement, administer, or enforce Davis-Bacon prevailing rate wage requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 238 (Roll no. 448).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
